About

Higly motivated self-taught software developer with a sound knowledge of JavaScript , React Js, Node js , Python, Django framework, SQL and NoSQL (MongoDB) programming languages. To contribute to the development of a highly competitive product, improving user experience, and enhancing both personal and organizational growth.

Work Experience

E-commerce Application

Name - E-commerce Application

This is a MERN stack project wiith a PayPal payment gateway. The project has two distinct users, an Admin and a root Users. Admins can perform all CRUD functions on both user an product management. The user can also update his profile and also get to see a history of purchases made.

Technologies Used

  • JavaScript
  • ReactJs
  • NodeJs/Express
  • React-Bootstrap
  • React-Redux
  • MongoDB
  • Formidable
  • JWT

Dice Game

Name - Dice-Game

Notable Features

  • This is a two-player dice game
  • A player must not roll a 1 else his roundscore becomes zero.
  • The winner is the player who first gets to a total score of 50

Technologies Used

  • JavaScript
  • CSS
  • HTML
